XResources

The are different resources that are needed by the different users and groups. These are .

Adding new resources

To add new resources that you would need for different users of your project ,

  1. Select the XResources entity. The xresources list window is displayed.
  2. Select Add. The Add xresources window is displayed.
  3. Enter Name and Description for the specific resource. These fields are mandatory.
  4. Click Save. The new resource is now added to your project.

Deleting resources

If any resource is to be removed, you can delete it from the list using Delete function.

To delete a resource:

  1. Under XResources list, click to select the resource to be deleted.
  2. Click Delete. The selected resource is deleted.

    Note:

    1. In case you do not select a resource, an error message is displayed stating “XResource not selected”.

Editing resources

You can edit the details for a specific resource including the name, description and the resource services. The actions related to the user can also be updated using the Edit function. To add an action to the resource:

  1. Under XResource > Edit click Actions.
  2. Under Actions, click Add and enter Name and Description.
  3. Click Save.

    You can delete any action added to the resource. To delete

  4. Select the action/ s from the list and click Delete. The action is removed from the list.

Refresh

In case any action like add or delete is not reflected in the action window, select Refresh. The page is refreshed to reflect the necessary changes.
